question: Based on the statements, which event involving the sun occurs once per day?

content.source_1: The North Point Lighthouse’s beacon is automated to switch on at local sunset every day.
content.source_2: Maintenance logs for this month show the automation controller passed all self-tests and executed its scheduled activations.
content.source_3: The lighthouse’s power system has delivered full voltage to the beacon circuit at sunset each day this week.
content.source_4: On Monday, technicians removed the beacon’s lamp module for replacement; until it is reinstalled next week, the fixture has no light-emitting unit.
content.source_5: When the lamp module is absent, the lighthouse emits no light at sunset even though the controller still triggers the circuit.
content.source_6: The replacement lamp module is scheduled to be installed next Monday, after the current maintenance week ends.
